channel.description: Ramblings of a geeky homeschooling dad

item.title: Talk about getting distracted!
item.description: I decided to start this blog/site because I have several ideas I want to write about before I get distracted by something else and forget them. I then proceeded to spend the rest of the day getting distracted by learning about Jekyll, the software that I'm using to create the site. Sigh... Well, at least it was educational.
